We have the text extracted to 01_topic_text.csv

```{r}
file <- read.csv("/Users/Alexey.Zhebel/IdeaProjects/CLClasses2022/Project/01_topic_text.csv", header = FALSE)
```
```{r}
topic_names <- file$V1
topic_texts <- file$V2
```
```{r}
topic_names[2]
substr(topic_texts[2], start = 1, stop = 100)
```
```{r}
library(text2vec)
```
```{r}
tokens <- itoken(word_tokenizer(topic_texts))
```
```{r}

vocab <- create_vocabulary(tokens)
```
Vocabulary:
```{r}
vocab
```
```{r}
vectorizer <- vocab_vectorizer(vocab)
```
```{r}
t1 <- Sys.time()
dtm <- create_dtm(tokens, vectorizer)
print(difftime(Sys.time(), t1, units = "sec"))
```
Document-term matrix:
```{r}
print(dim(dtm))
```
```{r}
tfidf <- fit_transform(dtm, TfIdf$new())
```
TFIDF:
```{r}
dim(tfidf)
```
